page.title: 11The Arts
page.content: Many people are involved in amateur music and arts societies.Abergavenny Orchestral Society and Gwent Bach Society give concerts locally while the Gwent Singers have also performed in London and Germany. Abergavenny Light Opera Society usually perform the works of Gilbert and Sullivan while the Abergavenny Amateur Operatic and Dramatic Society choose more modern works. The long established Pantomime Company put on a show each year which involves many youngsters. The Gwent Theatre Group also aim to encourage young people to become involved in the theatre. Abergavenny Borough Band,which was formed in the last century, is still very active. Abergavenny Art Group aims to provide instruction for those who wish to paint and draw.They also have courses for those who appreciate art.
